info.name: Wipro Event Management REST API
info.description: REST API for the Wipro Event Management Application.

request.description: Signup/register user. Please note that it will create user with full name, email and password first. The user profile will then be updated using the update user endpoint.
Delete User. Please note that soft delete should be performed and the status should be set to deleted status, but the entity should remain.
Delete Session. Please note that soft delete should be performed and the status should be set to deleted status, but the entity should remain.
Delete Event. Please note that soft delete should be performed and the status should be set to deleted status, but the entity should remain.
Delete EventWallPost. All child posts should be deleted.
Get user's notifications. The current user will be identified by token.
Get UserNotes. The current user will be identified by token.
